headline: Citizens Survey: ‘Great Wealth Transfer’ Presents New Era of Financial Opportunity for Women
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., March 05, 2025--As the ‘Great Wealth Transfer’ accelerates, complex gender divides surrounding wealth are becoming more pronounced than ever. In anticipation of this historic wealth distribution, where Baby Boomers are expected to pass down $124 trillion in assets to heirs by 2048*, a new survey from Citizens found women report a lack of confidence and proactiveness when it comes to financial planning. Considering that women are expected to control a staggering $34 trillion in
